document_data.name: Fanegonorom
document_data.mainbody: '''Fanegonorom''' was a [[revenant]] that dwelled within ancestral crypts of the Korlasz family as of the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: As a revenant, Fanegonorom could control lesser [[undead]] creatures and his touch could inflict disease upon others.
document_data.History:
During his life as a mortal, he possessed the ''[[shield of Egons]]'' and cherished it dearly.

When the individual known as [[Korlasz]] delved into her family's crypts, her followers and mercenaries desecrated the sanctity of Fanegonorom's resting place. He sought Korlasz's death so that he could rest in peace.
